name: 2024 11th International Conference on Mechanics, Materials and Manufacturing
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. Accepted and presented papers in ICMMM 2024 will be published into Conference Proceedings or Journals, as followings: \*Option I: Key Engineering Materials (ISSN: 1662-9795)/Materials Science Forum (ISSN: 1662-9752), Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, Inspec (IET), CAS, etc. (only for papers related to Material) \*Option B: International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (ISSN: 2278-0149 (Online), Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. (only for papers related to Mechanical and Manufacturing)
